Twister


*Twister had never felt so unwanted in her whole life. She wasn't=
 wanted by her own family but she was took in by other bots that had a home=
 and felt deep pity for her. But she wasn't even took in by one. She felt s=
he was an only child since it has been days and days since she'd seen her s=
ister. She got to thinking that she'd been wrong the whole time about tryin=
g to get Blizzard away from Sinister. She had never felt the depressed emot=
ions her whole life and now she did*

*Twister frowns and looks at herself.=
 So much wishing that she had mirror so she could get a good idea of what s=
ection of her face to punch. She starts to get hungrier and looks at some w=
ires on herself and starts getting hungry enough to eat herself like she ha=
d mentioned earlier*

*Twister starts shaking of hunger and bares her teeth=
 and groans*

Twister: Heh.....heh heh......Hahahaha......I've served my po=
rpose by keeping my sister company till she met the right bot to take over =
that job......My porpose in life, a big waste.....

*Twister takes her doub=
le bladed sword out*

*Twister so badly wants to kill herself but even toug=
h she thinks that Blizzard wouldn't want to see her again, she so badly wan=
ted to see Blizzard. Twister slowly puts her double bladed sword away and s=
ighs a deep sigh of deprestion and frowns. She sits on rock and picks up a =
smaller rock and swallows it. She was still hungry and thirsty. Twister kne=
w her deprestion was growing bigger but she'd rather die than let one tear =
slip by*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2000 4:26 AM
  Subject: Re: Sinesis,=
 still waiting........


  Sinesis starts to ponder about killing himself. =
He had a good life with the Predacons, but he was kicked out quickly upon h=
is return. Then he realized the truth. Nobody wanted bounty hunters anymore=
...he was out of work. Sinesis started to push the self destruct sequence o=
n a keypad but changed his mind. He was too afraid to kill himself...
    -=
---- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2000 9:56 PM
    Subject: Re: Sinesi=
s, still waiting........


    Twister


    *Twister frowns and blinks her=
 optics*


    Twister: "If that's where we're left to be....."

    *Twist=
er looks around herself and frowns as she see's so fruit or anything on any=
 trees*

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2000 5:09 PM
      Sub=
ject: Re: Sinesis, still waiting........


      "Live in the jungle? I hop=
e that was a joke, Twister!" Sinesis said angrily. He didn't like jokes, un=
less he was the one pulling them. Sinesis realized that Twister was right, =
though.

      "Well, we'll make the most of it out in the wild, then, we h=
ave no place to go." Sinesis said. He looked at a cave. Caves always creepe=
d him out, especially when there were THINGS in it...
        ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
        Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 7:06 PM
        Subject: Re: Sin=
esis, still waiting........


        Twister


        *Twister looks at S=
inesis and frowns. She follows Sinesis*


        Twister:  "We can always =
live in the jungle."

        *Twister says to Sinesis*

          ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
          Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 2:42 AM
          Subject: Si=
nesis, still waiting........


          Sinesis keeps on waiting. Suddenly=
, he figures that the leader is on vacation (Whomever gave him that idea?) =
and starts to walk away, slwoly shaking his head no to Twister...
